name: closefriend
text: Philippe looks incredibly interested in booze, which will serve him well if his childhood keeps going the way it's going.

name: mortshire
text: philippe is incredibly interested in everything.

name: ghede
text: A comment left by ghede was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by envika, waddlerz, jeffreyquah, Doc_Rostov)

name: greening_cow
text: Why would people lame your facts? They is what they is.

name: shinkusan
text: Oi! Who the hell are you?

name: shinkusan
text: Oh, apologies. I just remembered that I'm named Shinkusan on assetbar. My normal nomenclature for computer games is Greening_Cow

name: deusoma
text: What an odd coincidence.

name: shinkusan
text: Yeah. I still want answers though. It doesn't seem like a very common name (which is why I use it.)

name: dougthehead
text: The Playboy Advisor seems to be Achewood's own personal Wizard of Oz or something- he's the most knowledgeable and reasonable person in the whole strip.

name: belgand
text: Well, it is the absolute best part of Playboy. Unless Chuck Palahniuk has some new short fiction in it or something in which case it's a toss-up.

name: axhoola
text: I'm not sure if you've noticed, but there are pictures of naked women in Playboy.

name: belgand
text: Yes, but they're often not worth looking at. They are really pretty low on the list of "good aspects of Playboy" and often come close to "bad aspects of Playboy".

name: rawk5tar
text: So are you homosexuals or what

name: belgand
text: No, we just have different preferences. I'm not in to the whole heavily made-up, bleached-blonde, fake-tits look. I find it unappealing.

name: rawk5tar
text: A comment left by rawk5tar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kaz, redion, Fermatprime)

name: tekende
text: I would like this thread to keep going for a few more posts.

name: shutup_shutup
text: So are you longthreadophiliacs or what

name: mockereo
text: no he just likes long things

name: random_shorts
text: ...that i boned

name: epicurus
text: I know a guy like this. He seems to know all kinds of neat facts about lots of things, alcohol in particular, and then you find his exact side of a coversation in Maxim.

name: whoper
text: I do that.  It's a bit of a "bachelor's trick."

name: straw
text: I find it interesting that no one has commented on how sharply both Ray and Phillipe are dressed.

name: stuart
text: You have to dress sharp when you run for President.

name: heyman
text: You have to dress sharp when you travel overseas

name: farqussus
text: That, I assure you, is not a fact.

name: dovey
text: Ray's wearing the same hat he went to Hell in.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: It's his Travelin' hat

name: achilleselbow
text: He is from history.

name: cpnglxynchos
fuzzyshoo
text: this is excellent.

name: relaxing
text: My first Achewood.  This single punchline hooked me into reading the entire archive that weekend (3/19/2004 was a Friday.)

name: lawdog
text: Philippe will be the most cultured otter in his kindergarten class.

name: i_love_kate
text:
PHILLIPE'S EXPRESSION OH MY GOD PHILLIPE'S EXPRESSION.

Five'd!

name: saru
text: Phillipe is so intent on Ray's words, as if he is to be quizzed at the end of the journey.

name: laikalost
text: A comment left by laikalost was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Semiquaver, andrew_k, Boredom_Man)

name: misterkoss
text: Though the observations in question are acutally concerning whiskey. Come to think of it, there's little talk of wine in Achewood. Its characters seem to be beer and whiskey guys. Perhaps this is why I relate to it so much...

name: fineoakstructure
text: We know Beef defintely isn't much of an oenophile

name: softerworld
text: dang. all whiskey gettin on his paws. all fur gettin in the whiskey. ain't no one gonna want to drink that.

name: sp1derbaby
text: He reads it for the articles.

name: beachy
text:
I particularly enjoyed "See here, Phillipe!"
Don't know why.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Ray goes to the Duty-Free at both ends of the journey

name: achewood
text: I aim to lick my prick, which is slick, and perhaps thick.

name: notcool
text:
Congratulations, my beautiful, beautiful friend. This asset, that you have so skillfully woven, has convinced me to hit the IGNORE USER button once again. Do not worry, though, for having learned from great books the proper murder act on a not-so-right-in-the-head fella, I will chubby you before the trigger is pulled.

Shhhh, little Achewood. Be at peace.

Be at peace.

name: art-vader
text: Dont you get it? Ray never memorized it. He wrote it! He IS the Playboy Advisor. The job must be easy for him seeing how he is one of the dirtiest dudes in town

name: vulpes-aurum
text: I imagine Ray feigning a British accent in this particular strip.
